context_summary: Comment on issue #5: whats the issue with the build

decisions.thought: the build is failing because blog is in output/docs/ but github pages expects docs/ at root
decisions.action: create docs/ folder with jekyll config and dynamic repo data

actions_taken: created docs/ directory at repo root
moved blog to docs/index.html with jekyll config
added github metadata plugin for dynamic repo data
commented on issue #5 with fix explanation
